Title: Relates to requiring schools to conduct annual lead testing
Summary: Requires schools to conduct annual lead testing on pipes and paint in all schools in New York city that provide schooling for children ages six and under and to remediate any presence of lead immediately if detected.
LawCode: Add Title 17 Chap 9 Subchap 3 §§17-930 - 17-932, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring annual lead inspections in schools which house children ages six and under
